author: radekkapka
content:
One of Prysm's Discord user asked when exactly withdrawals will be available because he found some inconsistencies in Prysm's docs (which were based on the launchpad) and the ethereum.org website.

Launchpad:
> Validators will have to wait until phase 2 (around two years) to be able to withdraw to a specific shard.

https://ethereum.org/en/eth2/
> You won't be able to withdraw your ETH until the shard chains are available in Phase 1.

author: radekkapka
content: It would be nice to align this part since it's a very important piece of knowledge for potential stakers.

author: superphiz
content: I can confirm that this confusion exists in the ethstaker community.
